name: Roll Way to the Cloud
description:
**Roll Way to the Cloud **

Roll your way out.

Shapes will stamp on your dice. 

The new shape will cover the old one.

Star can't contact other shapes.

White Block erases everything but Star.

Have Fun!

    ! IMPORTANT! Please enable hardware acceleration in your browser!!

______________________________________________________________________

This game was made for the GMTK Jam 2022

______________________________________________________________________
